banner_details:
The banner has a soft, elegant aesthetic designed to highlight a luxurious jewelry product. The background features a pastel pink gradient with abstract circular shapes and soft curves, creating a feminine and classy appeal. At the center is a high-resolution image of a pair of rose gold earrings framed by two semi-transparent concentric circles for visual emphasis. The main title text layer (`heading`) sits at the top in a serif font, conveying sophistication. A subheading (`subheading`) further clarifies the product category using a bold, sans-serif typeface. Below the product image is a bold price tag (`price`) and a call-to-action button comprising a rectangle (`cta_background`) and accompanying text (`cta`). 

**Color Palette:**
- Rose Pink (#D06A87)
- Deep Mauve (#B34B6A)
- Soft Blush (#FFF5F7)
- Light Rose Mist (#FADEE5)
- Pale Pink (#F8CAD5)
- Button Text White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image showcases a pair of intricately designed earrings, featuring a delicate blend of rose gold and crystal white hues. The primary color is a soft **rose pink (#F8B7B4)**, used for the metal structure and floral drop forms, adding a warm and feminine aesthetic. Sparkling **crystal white (#FFFFFF)** stones and faceted translucent **diamond-like accents (#E6E9F0)** are arranged symmetrically, enhancing elegance and luxury. The rose gold metal is subtly modeled with gradients to highlight contours, creating depth and shine. These colors blend seamlessly yet stand out, making them ideal for a banner with a romantic or luxury-focused theme.
